I have downloaded this file, but where do i Unzip it? 

I dont have the demo, i have the whole game..So the readme file dosent help

Unzip "graphics" and "skins" to C:\Documents and Settings\user name\My Documents\Sports Interactive\Football Manager 2008

in preferences untick "use skin cache" and tick "always reload skin on confirm" and play!

It is Background file error. Sorry, I had the same error. 
Download this file

http://files.filefront.com/sylvinhoJPG/;9211748;/fileinfo.html

And replace here
C:\Documents and Settings\user name\My Documents\Sports Interactive\Football Manager 2008\graphics\pictures\backgrounds\players\megapack

thank you very much!
